Uses of Package
com.microsoft.band.tiles

  • Packages that use com.microsoft.band.tiles 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.band  
    com.microsoft.band.tiles  
  • Classes in com.microsoft.band.tiles used by com.microsoft.band 
    Class and Description
    BandTileManager
    Manager for performing tile manipulation on a Microsoft Band through Microsoft Health's band communication service
  • Classes in com.microsoft.band.tiles used by com.microsoft.band.tiles 
    Class and Description
    BandIcon
    Wrapper class for bitmaps that will be converted into icons on a Microsoft Band
    BandTile
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band tile
    BandTile.Builder
    Builder class for BandTile objects.
    TileButtonEvent
    An event resulting from a button being pressed on a Microsoft Band tile created by the calling application
    TileEvent
    An event resulting from a tile created by the application being opened or closed on a Microsoft Band
